thread.title: Satisfied Custome BobH.r
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Satisfied Custome BobH.r

author: Satisfied Custome BobH.r
title: Satisfied Custome BobH.r
text: White Mountain puzzles have provided me many a day and evening of puzzling fun. The pieces seem to be just the right size and fit together quite nicely. They are a "fun time" and fun way to to spend an afternoon.
